headline: Jim Cramer Calls Johnson Controls a “Very Good Company”
summary: Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE:JCI) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently gave takes on. A caller asked for Cramer’s short-term and long-term outlook on the stock. He replied: “Johnson Controls has done a very good job of moving into the data center. I do like Vertiv more, but Johnson Controls is a very […]
